attributes.action: Introduce a zero tolerance policy for offenders in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that with immediate effect the Prime Minster should introduce a zero tolerance policy for offenders in this country as the quality of life for many hard working tax paying individuals is being blemished by their actions and society as a whole is suffering.  The measures should include the following:

Tougher enforceable penalties for gun related crime

Tougher sentences for muggings and street theft

Tougher sentences for gang related crime

Tougher sentences for Burglaries
